name: The Hitcher
description:
THE HITCHER

by Joshua McBride/Josh Patterson

CONTROLS

Use the mouse to move the camera

Use Spacebar to advance dialogue

Use Arrow Keys and Enter to make dialogue selections

The Hitcher is a surreal narrative game taking place in a liminal area known only as "the road." Perhaps you've been there before. Journeys down this strange and eerie road are generally solitary ones, but this proves not to be the case on this particular day. 

You spy by the side of the road a strange figure, who appears to need a lift. On a whim, you decide to indulge them. Only once they have gotten into your car, they seem very interested in finding out more about you, your life...and what has brought you to the road. Converse with the Hitcher, decide what to ask them, and how to respond to what they ask you in return. Maybe, though, you want to consider carefully how much you give away.
